name: athenapdf-prebuilt
author: Ivo von Putzer Reibegg <ivo.putzer@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ivoputzer)
description: a prebuilt version of the athenapdf binary

scripts.preinstall: git config -f .gitmodules --get-regex submodule\.\*url | sed 's/submodule.//g;s/.url//g' | awk '{print $2,$1}' | xargs -n2 git clone --recursive | sh
